column1: <FontBlue>Join a Clan</> and <FontBlue>conquer Fortresses and Castles</> to earn <FontBlue>special benefits</>!
Enjoy <FontBlue>real-time battles</> in Lineage 2: Revolution's massive <FontBlue>open world</>.
You can <FontBlue>fight other players</> in <FontBlue>areas where PK is permitted</>.
Join a <FontBlue>Clan</> to take advantage of <FontBlue>various features</> and benefits.
Conquer territory in <FontBlue>Fortress Sieges</> to reap <FontBlue>incredible rewards</> and get <FontBlue>honor</>.
